abilities.title: Nobles & Armor
abilities.description: Nobles can use all types of armor, with preferences varying by individual. Some favor ornate scale or plate armor, others opt for less conspicuous leather or plate-and-chain combinations. Usual penalties apply: -15% to prowl, -20% to climb/scale walls in full splint/plate; -10% to prowl/climb in chain/scale; -5% to prowl/climb in studded leather. No penalties for hard/soft leather or padded armor.

abilities.title: Family Background & Family Skills
abilities.description: Same as the Knight O.C.C.; see that description for details on family background and skills. Make random rolls or selections from the tables found under the Knight O.C.C.
